meanings.definition: Tressing (verb): to arrange or style hair in a braid or twist
meanings.sent1: She enjoys tressing her long hair before going out.
meanings.sent2: Every morning, she spends time tressing her hair into elegant braids.
meanings.sent3: While tressing her hair, she accidentally tangled the strands together.
meanings.sent4: Her fingers moved swiftly, tressing her hair like a skilled artist.
meanings.sent5: The hairstylist demonstrated tressing techniques to the class.

meanings.definition: Tressing (noun): a braid or twist of hair
meanings.sent1: Her tressing looked beautiful with colorful ribbons woven through.
meanings.sent2: The intricate tressing held together her hair securely.
meanings.sent3: She admired the tressing in the mirror, feeling proud of her work.
meanings.sent4: The tressing resembled a delicate rope, adding charm to her look.
meanings.sent5: The princess's tressing was so elaborate, it seemed like a work of art.
